prompt: Design a user role management interface with a futuristic neon theme. The app bar should display 'User Role Management' in glowing white text on a black background with a settings icon. Include a search bar with a neon blue border and placeholder text 'Search users'. The main content should be a scrollable list of user cards with a glassmorphism effect (semi-transparent background), each featuring a circular avatar with a neon glow, user name in bold white text, email in cyan, and role badges ('Admin' in neon red, 'Editor' in neon blue, 'Viewer' in neon green) on the right. Add an 'Edit Role' button with a neon blue glow at the bottom of each card. Use a dark background with neon accents.
